BDTube Section 1 Section 2 Section 3 Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer List Search launcher Hello world! Settings BDTubeVideoViewActivity BD Tube is a video streaming service for Banglalink users. Subscribers will get to watch 5 FREE videos everyday and view unlimited videos on demand.


To activate BdTube click "Confirm" button below!

 You will be charged TK2(+SD&VAT)/Daily with Auto-renewal. 


To deactivate type STOP bdtube and send SMS to 6624. BD Tube is a video streaming service for Grameenphone users. Subscribers will get to watch 5 FREE videos everyday and view unlimited videos on demand.


To activate BdTube click "Confirm" button below!

 You will be charged TK2(+SD&VAT)/Daily with Auto-renewal.


To deactivate type STOP bdtube and send SMS to 6624. BD Tube is a video streaming service for Teletalk users. Subscribers will get to watch 5 FREE videos everyday and view unlimited videos on demand.


To activate BdTube click "Confirm" button below!

 You will be charged TK2(+SD&VAT)/Daily with Auto-renewal.


To deactivate type STOP bdtube and send SMS to 6624. BD Tube is a video streaming service for Airtel users. Subscribers will get to watch 5 FREE videos everyday and view unlimited videos on demand.


To activate BdTube click "Confirm" button below!

 You will be charged TK2(+SD&VAT)/Daily with Auto-renewal.


To deactivate type STOP bdtube and send SMS to 6624. // Service Name: BdTube

 Service Type: Video streaming application.

 Charging info:


• Subscription fee Tk2(+SD & VAT)/Day with auto-renewal.

 • Tk2(+SD & VAT)/5 views after assume free daily limits.

 • Tk20(+SD & VAT)/Full Movie.

 • Full Movie will not consider under daily free limits & five bundle views against of Tk2(+SD & VAT).

 Service modality:


• User has to subscribe by Tk2(+SD & VAT) to streaming exclusive videos.

 • Since its subscription model, daily Tk2(+SD & VAT) will deduct from user’s account, even user do not view their free contents.

 • This cycle will continue until user deactivates the service because this is an auto-renewal process.
 
 Deactivation: To deactivate type STOP bdtube and send SMS to 6624

 Support:

 Helpline: 8801992303765 

 Support e-mail : support@vumobile.biz
 //dialog_faq Service Name: BdTube 

 Service Type: Video streaming application.

 What is BDTube ?


BD Tube is a Video streaming application.

 What is BdTube Portal Address?

 http://bdtube.mobi 

 Why should I subscribe in BD Tube ?


From BdTube application.you can enjoy exclusive latest Video.

 How much I have to pay for all these service?


• Daily Charging Taka 2(+SD&VAT) with auto-renewal.


• Daily watch 5 FREE videos.

 Subscription process :


• To Activate: Type START BDTUBE & send SMS to 6624

 • To Deactivate: Type STOP BDTUBE & send SMS to 6624

 What is the helpline/hotline number for all Operators?


8801992303765

 What is the time to get the helpline support?


8:00 AM – 8:00 PM

 Is this site providing any email support?


Yes

 What is the support email address?

 Support email: support@vumobile.biz
